title: Is Shaun King really African American? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shaun King, much like Rachel Dolezal, is lying about his genetic and ethnic makeup because without being able to cash in on that status, he’s a charlatan and a fraud, just another white guy who clung to the BLM movement for his own fame. There’s literally no reason to believe his claims, especially given his penchant for being a pathological liar. After all, that’s why he got signed with the Young Turks to a half-mil a year contract.

His Wikipedia page states he’s American. Why are you so concerned about ethnic backgrounds? My family has been resident in America since the late 1600s. My genetic back is a multiplicity of ethnic backgrounds. I am American and I am Legion.
